24#define WAIT_CDC() \
25 while(true) { \
26 furi_check(furi_mutex_acquire(usb_can->tx_mutex, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk); \
27 if(!cdc_busy) { \
28 cdc_busy = true; \
29 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(usb_can->tx_mutex) == FuriStatusOk); \
30 break; \
31 } \
32 furi_check(furi_mutex_release(usb_can->tx_mutex) == FuriStatusOk); \
33 }
35#define M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_LENGTH() \
36 usb_can_bridge_error(usb_can, invalid_length, data[0], len)
38#define M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_COMMAND() \
39 usb_can_bridge_error(usb_can, invalid_command, data[0], data[0])
40
41/* ----------------------------------------------------------- DEFINES (CONSTANTS)--------------------------------------------------------------- */
43typedef enum {
44 WorkerEvtStop = (1 << 0),
45 WorkerEvtRxDone = (1 << 1),
46
47 WorkerEvtTxStop = (1 << 2),
48 WorkerEvtCdcRx = (1 << 3),
49
50 WorkerEvtCfgChange = (1 << 4),
51} WorkerEvtFlags;
52
54#define WORKER_ALL_RX_EVENTS (WorkerEvtStop | WorkerEvtRxDone | WorkerEvtCfgChange)
56#define WORKER_ALL_TX_EVENTS (WorkerEvtTxStop | WorkerEvtCdcRx)
58#define USB_CAN_RX_BUF_SIZE (USB_CDC_PKT_LEN * 5)
60#define USB_CAN_BRIDGE_MAX_INPUT_LENGTH 28
61

65static void vcp_state_callback(void* context, uint8_t state);
66static void vcp_on_cdc_control_line(void* context, uint8_t state);
67static void vcp_on_line_config(void* context, struct usb_cdc_line_coding* config);
68static void usb_can_bridge_error(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, const char* err_msg_format, ...);
69static void usb_can_bridge_configure(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, char* data, uint32_t len);
70static void
71 usb_can_bridge_send(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, char* data, uint32_t len, bool extended, bool rtr);
72static bool _usb_uart_bridge_get_next_command(

74 uint8_t* cmd_length,
75 char* cdc_data,

83const char serma_banner[] =
84 "\r\n"
85 " ___________ __ ______ _______ ___ ________ _ __ _______ \r\n"
86 " / __/ __/ _ \\/ |/ / _ | / __/ _ \\/ _ \\ / ___/ _ | / |/ / / __/ _ \\ \r\n"
87 " _\\ \\/ _// , _/ /|_/ / __ | / _// ___/ // / / /__/ __ |/ / / _// // /\r\n"
88 "/___/___/_/|_/_/ /_/_/ |_| /_/ /_/ \\___/ \\___/_/ |_/_/|_/ /_/ /____/ \r\n"
89 "Serma Safety and Security (S3) - 2024 \r\n";

95static const CdcCallbacks cdc_cb = {
96 vcp_on_cdc_tx_complete,
97 vcp_on_cdc_rx,
98 vcp_state_callback,
99 vcp_on_cdc_control_line,
100 vcp_on_line_config,
101};

118static void usb_can_on_irq_cb(void* context) {
119 UsbCanBridge* app = (UsbCanBridge*)context;
120 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(app->thread), WorkerEvtRxDone);
121 furi_hal_gpio_disable_int_callback(&gpio_ext_pc3);
122}
126static void usb_can_vcp_init(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, uint8_t vcp_ch) {
127 furi_hal_usb_unlock();
128 furi_hal_cdc_set_callbacks(vcp_ch, (CdcCallbacks*)&cdc_cb, usb_can);
129}
130
137static void usb_can_vcp_deinit(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, uint8_t vcp_ch) {
138 UNUSED(usb_can);
139 furi_hal_cdc_set_callbacks(vcp_ch, NULL, NULL);
140 if(vcp_ch != 0) {
141 Cli* cli = (Cli*)furi_record_open(RECORD_CLI);
142 cli_session_close(cli);
143 furi_record_close(RECORD_CLI);
144 }
145}
146
150static void usb_can_print_banner(UsbCanBridge* usb_can) {
151 uint32_t i;
152 (void)usb_can;
153
154 for(i = 0; i < sizeof(serma_banner) - CDC_DATA_SZ; i += CDC_DATA_SZ) {
155 WAIT_CDC();
156 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)&serma_banner[i], CDC_DATA_SZ);
157 }
158 WAIT_CDC();
159 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)&serma_banner[i], sizeof(serma_banner) - i);
160}

185static int32_t usb_can_worker(void* context) {
186 UsbCanBridge* usb_can = (UsbCanBridge*)context;
187 uint32_t events = 0;
188 uint32_t tmp_data;
189
190 if(usb_can->state != UsbCanLoopBackTestState) {
191 furi_hal_gpio_init(&gpio_ext_pc3, GpioModeInterruptFall, GpioPullUp, GpioSpeedVeryHigh);
192 furi_hal_gpio_remove_int_callback(&gpio_ext_pc3);
193 furi_hal_gpio_add_int_callback(&gpio_ext_pc3, usb_can_on_irq_cb, usb_can);
194 furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_init(&furi_hal_spi_bus_handle_external);
195 usb_can->can = new mcp2518fd(0);
196
197 if(usb_can->state == UsbCanPingTestState) {
198 const char test_can_msg[] = "CANLIVE";
199
200 while(!(events & WorkerEvtStop)) {
201 usb_can->can->begin(CAN20_500KBPS, CAN_SYSCLK_40M);
202 usb_can->can->sendMsgBuf(
203 (uint32_t)0x7E57CA, (byte)1, (byte)8, (const byte*)test_can_msg);
204 events = furi_thread_flags_get();
205 }
206 return 0;
207 }
208 }
209 memcpy(&usb_can->cfg, &usb_can->cfg_new, sizeof(UsbCanConfig));
210 usb_can->rx_stream = furi_stream_buffer_alloc(USB_CAN_RX_BUF_SIZE, 1);
211
212 usb_can->tx_mutex = furi_mutex_alloc(FuriMutexTypeNormal);
213 usb_can->timer = furi_timer_alloc(usb_can_bridge_clear_led, FuriTimerTypeOnce, usb_can);
214
215 usb_can->tx_thread = furi_thread_alloc_ex("UsbCanTxWorker", 2048, usb_can_tx_thread, usb_can);
216
217 usb_can_vcp_init(usb_can, usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch);
218 usb_can_print_banner(usb_can);
219
220 WAIT_CDC();
221 if(usb_can->state != UsbCanLoopBackTestState) {
222 const char hello_bridge_usb[] = "USB BRIDGE STARTED\r\n";
223 furi_hal_cdc_send(
224 usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)hello_bridge_usb, sizeof(hello_bridge_usb));
225 } else {
226 const char hello_test_usb[] = "USB LOOPBACK TEST START\r\n";
227 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)hello_test_usb, sizeof(hello_test_usb));
228 }
229
230 furi_thread_start(usb_can->tx_thread);
231
232 while(1) {
233 events = furi_thread_flags_wait(WORKER_ALL_RX_EVENTS, FuriFlagWaitAny, FuriWaitForever);
234 furi_check(!(events & FuriFlagError));
235 if(events & WorkerEvtStop) break;
236 if(events & WorkerEvtRxDone) {
237 int printSize;
238 byte len = 0;
239 REG_CiINTENABLE flags;
240 unsigned char buf[256];
241
242 usb_can->can->readMsgBuf(&len, buf); // You should call readMsgBuff before getCanId
243 usb_can->can->mcp2518fd_readClearInterruptFlags(&flags);
244 furi_hal_gpio_enable_int_callback(&gpio_ext_pc3);
245 unsigned long id = usb_can->can->getCanId();
246 byte ext = usb_can->can->isExtendedFrame();
247 char msg[] = "t%03lX%1d";
248 if(ext) {
249 msg[0] = 'T';
250 msg[2] = '8';
251 }
252 char tmp[32];
253 printSize = snprintf(tmp, sizeof(msg), msg, id, len);
254 for(int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
255 tmp_data = buf[i];
256 printSize += snprintf(&tmp[printSize], 3, "%02lX", tmp_data);
257 }
258 printSize += snprintf(&tmp[printSize], 3, "\r\n");
259 WAIT_CDC();
260 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)tmp, printSize);
261 usb_can->st.rx_cnt += len;
262 }
263
264 if(events & WorkerEvtCfgChange) {
265 if(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch != usb_can->cfg_new.vcp_ch) {
266 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(usb_can->tx_thread), WorkerEvtTxStop);
267 furi_thread_join(usb_can->tx_thread);
268
269 usb_can_vcp_deinit(usb_can, usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch);
270 usb_can_vcp_init(usb_can, usb_can->cfg_new.vcp_ch);
271
272 usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch = usb_can->cfg_new.vcp_ch;
273 furi_thread_start(usb_can->tx_thread);
274 }
275 api_lock_unlock(usb_can->cfg_lock);
276 }
277 }
278 usb_can_vcp_deinit(usb_can, usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch);
279
280 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(usb_can->tx_thread), WorkerEvtTxStop);
281 furi_thread_join(usb_can->tx_thread);
282 furi_thread_free(usb_can->tx_thread);
283
284 furi_stream_buffer_free(usb_can->rx_stream);
285 furi_mutex_free(usb_can->tx_mutex);
286
287 furi_hal_usb_unlock();
288 furi_check(furi_hal_usb_set_config(&usb_cdc_single, NULL) == true);
289 Cli* cli = (Cli*)furi_record_open(RECORD_CLI);
290 cli_session_open(cli, &cli_vcp);
291 furi_record_close(RECORD_CLI);
292
293 return 0;
294}
295
310static int32_t usb_can_tx_thread(void* context) {
311 UsbCanBridge* usb_can = (UsbCanBridge*)context;
312 uint8_t data[USB_CDC_PKT_LEN];
314 const char invalid_command[] = "[err]: invalid command received '%c' in ascii (0x%02X)\r\n";
315 while(1) {
316 uint32_t events =
317 furi_thread_flags_wait(WORKER_ALL_TX_EVENTS, FuriFlagWaitAny, FuriWaitForever);
318 furi_check(!(events & FuriFlagError));
319 if(events & WorkerEvtTxStop) break;
320 if(events & WorkerEvtCdcRx) {
321 WAIT_CDC();
322 size_t len = furi_hal_cdc_receive(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, data, USB_CDC_PKT_LEN);
323 cdc_busy = false;
324 if(usb_can->state == UsbCanLoopBackTestState) {
325 usb_can->st.tx_cnt += len;
326 WAIT_CDC();
327 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, data, len);
328
329 } else {
330 char* next_command = (char*)NULL;
331 uint8_t cmd_len = 0;
332 while(
333 _usb_uart_bridge_get_next_command(&next_command, &cmd_len, (char*)data, len)) {
334 if(cmd_len > USB_CAN_BRIDGE_MAX_INPUT_LENGTH) {
335 M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_LENGTH();
336 //invalid input, stop processing
337 continue;
338 }
339
340 switch(next_command[0]) {
341 case '\n':
342 case '\r':
343 //ignore carriage return and line feed sent alone (ex. putty)=> this is not considered as an error
344 if(cmd_len != 1) {
345 M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_COMMAND();
346 }
347 break;
348 case 'S':
349 usb_can_bridge_configure(usb_can, (char*)next_command, cmd_len);
350 break;
351 case 'O':
352 case 'C':
353 usb_can_bridge_error(
354 usb_can, "[err]: just select app with the flipper buttons! \r\n");
355 break;
356 case 's':
357 case 'G':
358 case 'W':
359 case 'V':
360 case 'v':
361 case 'N':
362 case 'I':
363 case 'L':
364 case 'F':
365 case 'Z':
366 usb_can_bridge_error(
367 usb_can,
368 "[err]: command %c<x> not implemented yet!\r\n",
369 next_command[0]);
370 break;
371 case 'R':
372 usb_can_bridge_send(usb_can, next_command, cmd_len, true, true);
373 break;
374 case 'r':
375 usb_can_bridge_send(usb_can, next_command, cmd_len, false, true);
376 break;
377 case 'T':
378 usb_can_bridge_send(usb_can, next_command, cmd_len, true, false);
379 break;
380 case 't':
381 usb_can_bridge_send(usb_can, next_command, cmd_len, false, false);
382 break;
383 default:
384 M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_COMMAND();
385 break;
386 }
387 }
388 }
389 }
390 }
391 return 0;
392}
393
398#define IS_LAST_CMD() (&((*next_command)[(*cmd_length)]) == &cdc_data[cdc_frame_len])
419static bool _usb_uart_bridge_get_next_command(
420 char** next_command,
421 uint8_t* cmd_length,
422 char* cdc_data,
423 uint8_t cdc_frame_len) {
424 if(*next_command == NULL) {
425 *next_command = cdc_data;
426 } else {
427 //This is not first command : update command pointer
428 *next_command = &((*next_command)[*cmd_length]);
429 }
430 *cmd_length = 0;
431 while(((*next_command)[(*cmd_length)] != '\r') && ((*next_command)[(*cmd_length)] != '\n') &&
432 (!IS_LAST_CMD())) {
433 (*cmd_length)++;
434 }
435 if(IS_LAST_CMD()) {
436 return false;
437 } else {
438 (*cmd_length)++;
439 }
440 return true;
441}
442
455static void usb_can_bridge_configure(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, char* data, uint32_t len) {
456 static const uint32_t bitrate_table[] = {
457 CAN20_10KBPS,
458 CAN20_20KBPS,
459 CAN20_50KBPS,
460 CAN20_100KBPS,
461 CAN20_125KBPS,
462 CAN20_250KBPS,
463 CAN20_500KBPS,
464 CAN20_800KBPS,
465 CAN20_1000KBPS,
466 CAN_500K_4M};
467
468 uint32_t idx;
469
470 if(len != 3) {
471 M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_LENGTH();
472 } else if(data[1] < '0' || data[1] > '9') {
473 usb_can_bridge_error(
474 usb_can, "invalid setting (command S): %c in ascii (character 0x%02X)\r\n", data[1]);
475 } else {
476 idx = atoi(&data[1]);
477 usb_can->can->begin(bitrate_table[idx], CAN_SYSCLK_40M);
478 can_if_initialized = true;
479 }
480}
481
512static void
513 usb_can_bridge_send(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, char* data, uint32_t len, bool extended, bool rtr) {
514 uint8_t data_bin[8];
515 uint32_t expected_len = 0;
516 uint32_t id;
517 uint32_t data_tmp;
518 uint32_t max_identifier;
519 uint8_t data_offset;
520 uint32_t min_length;
521 uint32_t max_length;
522 char frame_format[] = "t%3x%1x";
523 uint32_t dlc;
524
525 if(extended) {
526 max_identifier = 0x1FFFFFFF;
527 data_offset = 10;
528 if(rtr) {
529 frame_format[0] = 'R';
530 } else {
531 frame_format[0] = 'T';
532 }
533 frame_format[2] = '8';
534 } else {
535 max_identifier = 0x7FF;
536 data_offset = 5;
537 if(rtr) {
538 frame_format[0] = 'r';
539 };
540 }
541
542 min_length = data_offset;
543 max_length = min_length + 17;
544 if(!can_if_initialized) {
545 const char invalid_state[] = "[err]: please initialize CAN using Sx command!\r\n";
546 usb_can_bridge_error(usb_can, invalid_state, sizeof(invalid_state));
547 } else if(len >= min_length && len <= max_length) {
548 sscanf((const char*)&data[0], frame_format, (unsigned int*)&id, (unsigned int*)&dlc);
549 if(!rtr) {
550 expected_len = dlc;
551 }
552 if(id > max_identifier) {
553 const char invalid_identifier[] = "[err]: invalid can identifier (>%X): %X \r\n";
554 usb_can_bridge_error(usb_can, invalid_identifier, max_identifier, id);
555 } else if((len - data_offset) / 2 == expected_len) {
556 usb_can->can->mcpDigitalWrite(GPIO_PIN_0, GPIO_LOW);
557 usb_can->st.tx_cnt += expected_len;
558 for(uint32_t i = 0; i < expected_len; i++) {
559 sscanf((const char*)&data[data_offset + 2 * i], "%02lx", &data_tmp);
560 data_bin[i] = (uint8_t)(data_tmp & 0xFF);
561 }
562 usb_can->can->sendMsgBuf(id, extended, rtr, dlc, data_bin);
563
564 furi_timer_start(usb_can->timer, furi_kernel_get_tick_frequency() / 100);
565 } else {
566 usb_can_bridge_error(
567 usb_can,
568 "[err]: can payload length discrepency : expected %d got %d \r\n",
569 expected_len,
570 (len - data_offset) / 2);
571 }
572 } else {
573 M_USB_CAN_ERROR_INVALID_LENGTH();
574 }
575}
576
580static void usb_can_bridge_clear_led(void* context) {
581 (void)context;
582 UsbCanBridge* usb_can = (UsbCanBridge*)context;
583 usb_can->can->mcpDigitalWrite(GPIO_PIN_0, GPIO_HIGH);
584}
585
595static void usb_can_bridge_error(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, const char* err_msg_format, ...) {
596 uint32_t printSize;
597 char out_msg[64];
598 va_list args;
599 va_start(args, err_msg_format);
600 printSize = vsnprintf(out_msg, 64, err_msg_format, args);
601 WAIT_CDC();
602 furi_hal_cdc_send(usb_can->cfg.vcp_ch, (uint8_t*)out_msg, printSize);
603}

612static void vcp_on_cdc_tx_complete(void* context) {
613 (void)context;
614 cdc_busy = false;
615}
616
622static void vcp_on_cdc_rx(void* context) {
623 UsbCanBridge* usb_can = (UsbCanBridge*)context;
624 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(usb_can->tx_thread), WorkerEvtCdcRx);
625}

631 UNUSED(context);
632 UNUSED(state);
633}

637static void vcp_on_cdc_control_line(void* context, uint8_t state) {
638 UNUSED(context);
639 UNUSED(state);

645 UNUSED(context);

648/* ----------------------------------------------------------- GLOBAL FUNCTIONS IMPLEMENTATION--------------------------------------------------------------- */
659UsbCanBridge* usb_can_enable(UsbCanApp* app, usbCanState state) {
660 app->usb_can_bridge = (UsbCanBridge*)malloc(sizeof(UsbCanBridge));
661 app->usb_can_bridge->state = state;
662 app->usb_can_bridge->thread =
663 furi_thread_alloc_ex("UsbCanWorker", 2048, usb_can_worker, app->usb_can_bridge);
664
665 furi_thread_start(app->usb_can_bridge->thread);
666 return app->usb_can_bridge;
667}
668
677void usb_can_disable(UsbCanBridge* usb_can) {
678 furi_check(usb_can);
679 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(usb_can->thread), WorkerEvtStop);
680 furi_thread_join(usb_can->thread);
681 furi_thread_free(usb_can->thread);
682 free(usb_can);
683}
684
691void usb_can_set_config(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, UsbCanConfig* cfg) {
692 furi_check(usb_can);
693 furi_check(cfg);
694 usb_can->cfg_lock = api_lock_alloc_locked();
695 memcpy(&(usb_can->cfg_new), cfg, sizeof(UsbCanConfig));
696 furi_thread_flags_set(furi_thread_get_id(usb_can->thread), WorkerEvtCfgChange);
697 api_lock_wait_unlock_and_free(usb_can->cfg_lock);
698}
699
703void usb_can_get_config(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, UsbCanConfig* cfg) {
704 furi_check(usb_can);
705 furi_check(cfg);
706 memcpy(cfg, &(usb_can->cfg_new), sizeof(UsbCanConfig));
707}
708
712void usb_can_get_state(UsbCanBridge* usb_can, UsbCanStatus* st) {
713 furi_check(usb_can);
714 furi_check(st);
715 memcpy(st, &(usb_can->st), sizeof(UsbCanStatus));
716}
